story.title: A Love Affair with Muslin
story.subtitle: It's not just fabric. It’s a feeling of home.
story.p1: Our story isn’t a business plan. It's a love story. A story that begins with the simple, undeniable pleasure of being wrapped in something truly soft, something that breathes with you. It’s the feeling of a lazy Sunday morning, a warm hug, the gentle comfort you’ve always known. That’s muslin. That’s Saru.
story.p2: We fell in love with muslin not for what it is, but for how it makes us feel. The way its open weave allows air to kiss the skin, making it a companion for every season. The incredible transformation it undergoes, becoming softer and more personal with every wash, telling a story on its very threads.
story.p3: This isn't fast fashion. It's slow living. It's choosing a garment that becomes a part of your life, a reliable friend that offers comfort without asking for anything in return.
story.h2_2: More Than Clothing, It's a Choice
story.p4: Our passion extends to how each piece is created. We chose to work with artisans who share our reverence for the craft, whose hands carry generations of knowledge. We use natural dyes that give our fabrics their gentle, earthy tones, ensuring that what touches your skin is as pure and kind as nature itself.
story.p5: Choosing Saru is choosing to slow down. It's an invitation to find beauty in simplicity, to value comfort as a form of self-care, and to wear a piece of a story woven with passion, integrity, and a deep love for the simple magic of muslin.

whySaru.title: Why Saru?
whySaru.subtitle: The Simple Magic of Muslin Fabric
whySaru.p1: Saru is more than just a name; it's our word for muslin, a fabric cherished for centuries for its unique qualities. We chose muslin not just for its beauty, but for the incredible benefits it brings to your daily life. It's a fabric that cares for you, just as we care for the way it's made.
